name: The Ultimate Fan Camo Jacket, customized with handmade team/player patches
desc: The 'Ultimate Fan Jacket' Custom Camo Jacket is perfect for showing off your love for any player/coach on any Pro and most College teams. Comes in 2 sizes, S/M and L/XL (both fit slightly oversized).**Takes 1-4 weeks to complete. I will complete and ship ASAP. Please contact me if it is needed for a specific date to see if we can make it happen faster for you!!**The pictures that you see are ONLY EXAMPLES and NOT the actual product that you will receive. I try to use a variety of pictures to show the details/color options of this style, but if you want to see more or a specific team patch, please message me in the shop and I will be happy to help if I can.MOKI can crop your jacket or leave it a longer length. Then add handmade in studio, embroidered patches with team names, logos, players numbers, name badges and more!! If you do not see the color or size that you would like listed, please contact meIf you are interested in more details, or would like to discuss a possible design idea, please message shop owner.  Thank You! XOXO meliMOKI**don't forget to check us out on insta @meli_MOKI for all the new styles and lots of good design ideas!The base price of $180 covers the jacket, player name badge, player number and team patches. If you would like to add additional patches or have a different design in mind, please message me in the shop before you order. I will create a custom post just for you based on our design decisions.

name: PARIS LOVE JACKET - Exclusive "Ready to Wear Collection" - Medium

Embrace the magic of Paris and let your fashion soar with our Paris Love Jean Jacket. It's time to make a chic statement and capture the essence of amour!

name: Intensive Care Nurse Jacket ICU Nurse Embroidery Jacket
desc: Represent your hospital in style with an Intensive Care Nurse custom scrub jacket from our collection. We know you’re passionate about your job, and you take pride in helping people every day. So wear a jacket that reflects your dedication and shows off your skills! Order one for every member of your department for improved morale and true team spirit. Stunning DesignYour nurse jacket will feature one of our unique designs in detailed embroidery and sharp printing. We’ll embroider your name on the chest in your choice of color and font. With your name on display, co-workers will become friends and patients will feel more at ease. On one sleeve, we’ll print your department name in block letters that stand out. On the back of the jacket, we’ll embroider a stunning design that represents your area of expertise.Comfort and FunctionYou’ll find your personalized jacket as comfortable as it is eye-catching. The fit is flattering, so you’ll feel confident when you walk through the hospital doors. The fabric is soft against your skin, because comfort is the key to performing at your best. The moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool, even when you’re running to help a patient. Practical features ensure you’re prepared for every shift and crisis situation. There are handy pockets for your pager and other essentials, while the zipper makes removing your jacket quick and easy. Be the BestWhen it comes to your scrub jacket, quality and durability are important too. The fabric and colors stand up to multiple washes, so you’ll always look presentable and professional. Wear your jacket outside of work and, if there happens to be a medical emergency, bystanders will know you’re trained to help. Wear it at the hospital to protect your scrubs, keep you cozy, and spread the word about the amazing work you do. ◊ Material: 5.5 - ounce, 100% Polyester◊ Cadet collar◊ Taped neck◊ Slash pockets◊ How to wash it: Machine wash cold. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Remove promptly. Warm iron if necessary. Do not use softener. Personalized items are not returnable nor exchangeable.

name: Black Velvet Jacket with Exquisite Embroidered Peony Flowers
desc: 🌸🌸our Black Velvet Jacket with Exquisite Embroidered Peony Flowers. Elevate your style to new heights with this stunning piece that effortlessly blends luxurious comfort with intricate artistry.Crafted from sumptuously soft black velvet, this jacket envelopes you in a rich, velvety embrace that feels as good as it looks. The timeless black hue serves as a canvas for the meticulously handcrafted peony flower embroidery that graces the jacket. Each peony petal is delicately stitched, creating a symphony of colors and textures that dance in harmony with the luxurious backdrop of the velvet.The peony, often symbolizing grace, prosperity, and romance, takes center stage in this design. The embroidery captures every nuance of these exquisite blooms - from the subtle gradations of the petals to the intricate details of the stamens and leaves. The jacket's design is a fusion of modern style and traditional craftsmanship, allowing you to make a statement that is both contemporary and timeless.Whether you're attending a formal event, a cocktail party, or simply want to add a touch of opulence to your daily ensemble, this black velvet jacket is the perfect choice. The tailored fit ensures a flattering silhouette, while the intricate embroidery adds a touch of artistry that draws attention and admiration.This jacket is more than a piece of clothing; it's a work of wearable art that tells a story of elegance, creativity, and individuality. With its luxurious velvet texture and captivating peony embroidery, this jacket is a must-have for those who appreciate the finer things in life and want to make a lasting impression wherever they go.🌸🌸size: S-XLSmall: Should :17'', chest: 23'' (1/2), Length (from shoulder point): 37'', arm length: 20.5''， armhole 11‘’， Sleeve width： 9‘’Medium: Should :17.5'', chest: 24'' (1/2), Length (from shoulder point): 37'', arm length: 20.5''， armhole 11‘’， Sleeve width： 9‘’Large: Should :18'', chest: 25'' (1/2), Length (from shoulder point): 37'', arm length: 20.5''， armhole 11‘’， Sleeve width： 9‘’X-Large: Should :18.5'', chest: 26'' (1/2), Length (from shoulder point): 37'', arm length: 20.5''， armhole 11‘’， Sleeve width： 9‘’🌸🌸Dry Clean
